answer_list.text: racing game built on EOS blockchain. Players can bet on the guinea pigs they like to win the race and also EOS. In each round, you have about 3 minutes to choose from the 8 guinea pigs and place bets on them. Then the guinea pigs enter into a race and the result is revealed immediately.
